org.ranksys.diversity.prop.metrics

Class CPR<U,I,F>

  • java.lang.Object
    • es.uam.eps.ir.ranksys.metrics.AbstractRecommendationMetric<U,I>
      • org.ranksys.diversity.prop.metrics.CPR<U,I,F>
  • Type Parameters:
    U - type of user
    I - type of item
    F - type of feature
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    RecommendationMetric<U,I>

    public class CPR<U,I,F>
extends AbstractRecommendationMetric<U,I>
    Cumulative proportionality metric.
    Dang, V., Croft, W. B. (2012). Diversity by Proportionality: An Election-based Approach to Search Result Diversification. In Proceedings of the 35th International ACM SIGIR Conference on Research and Development in Information Retrieval (pp. 65–74). New York, NY, USA: ACM. doi:10.1145/2348283.2348296
    Author:
    Saúl Vargas (Saul.Vargas@mendeley.com)
